name: APEventure
description:
Experience a pirate ship controlled by monkeys ! Cooperate to keep the ship afloat and successfully return it to port.

Sit down with your friends to play cooperatively, and overcome the challenges together in your living room !

Controls (controler)

joystick : monkeys movements and climb on mask.

A : Jump

X : Interact, Put, Take

B : Throw, Slap

Right Trigger : Throw, Slap

Left Trigger : Interact

All credits goes to : Paul Béziers, Tristan Colombier, Sunny Pautrat, Aurélie Roux, Drai Mathieu, Tournier Pierrot, Maxence Hédont
